reviewText: If you like classic Nils, you should own this.  A bonus is that MY COPY WAS ALL REGIONS and plays on my U.S. dvd player.  The audience seems a bit subdued but he and his band put in a solid performance.  He does some Grin favorites plus songs from his rock period.  If you prefer a more mature Nils, his acoustic dvd is great too but both are worth having.
